coreAttributes.authorTag: A faint inscription underneath the cup lid reads 'S.G.C. Provisions'
coreAttributes.name: Maple Mocha
coreAttributes.description: A large, insulated cup filled with a hot coffee. Rich cocoa powder and a double dose of maple sugar is balanced against a double shot of cream, yet overall the flavors don't overpower the robust dark roast coffee. Beaver-morphs are commonly seen happily sipping cups of this brew on their way to work.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementMana(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_MANA_MAXIMUM)/20)]

An uplifting wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MANA_MAXIMUM, 2)] [#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_RESISTANCE_ICE, 2)]
